topic: Small Wins That Compound in Sobriety

cover.headline: How small wins stack up in
cover.subtitle: The science of daily choices that build on each other over time

slides.title: The Problem With Drinking
items: Each drink disrupts sleep, so fatigue clouds the next day
Stress hormones spike, making anxiety feel harder to shake
Recovery debt accumulates, which compounds with every binge

slides.title: Early Wins (Weeks 1-4)
items: REM sleep returns, allowing your brain to consolidate memories
GABA receptors recalibrate, so baseline anxiety starts dropping
Liver enzymes normalize, improving energy and mental clarity

slides.title: Long-Term Momentum (Months 2+)
items: Each sober day prevents kindling, protecting future recovery
Dopamine sensitivity restores, making everyday joys feel stronger
Saved money and better sleep compound into clearer decisions
